name: AMB1 and D3X-TR
description:
Get ready for the most challenging and addictive game of the GMTK Game Jam 2021! You play as AMB1 and D3X-TR in their struggle to survive The Gauntlet in order to earn their freedom. But there's a catch: you must control both of them at the same time!

Don't forget to checkout the official intro to the game on YouTube!

And if you liked any of the songs, you can find all of them on SoundCloud!

NOTE: If you have problems with the arrow keys not working, we also mapped IJKL to control the right side.
